rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance leading into a combined living area that integrates art deco elements with modern design, featuring polished concrete finishes, geometric patterns and elegant fixtures. This space also includes a reception area for guests.
rooms.vastu_notes: The entrance should be aligned to the north or east as per Vastu guidelines to promote positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Open Concept Dining and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A combined dining and kitchen space that reflects art deco design with chrome accents and curved forms. The layout is optimized for functional movement while maintaining open sightlines.
rooms.vastu_notes: The dining area should be located near the north-east corner to invite prosperity.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated space with soundproofing, seating arranged in a semi-circular design and built-in art deco decorative elements. The room uses ambient lighting to enhance viewing experience.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placing the home theater in the south-west corner helps balance energy by aligning with entertainment purposes.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom that features art deco-inspired fixtures and built-in storage solutions. The room's layout is optimized for privacy.
rooms.vastu_notes: The guest bedroom should be placed in a quiet corner, preferably the north-west to promote calmness.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A grand entrance door with art deco design detailing and weather-resistant materials. It opens into the central living area.

openings.name: Window Alcoves
openings.description: Multiple window openings in geometric patterns that enhance natural lighting, while offering views of the garden.

garden_access.description: A direct pathway from the living area to a large garden, designed with minimalist art deco landscaping elements and water features for tranquility.
garden_access.vastu_notes: The garden is positioned in the south-east to promote fertility and wealth.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: An expansive master bedroom with a private bathroom, walk-in closet and integrated art deco decor. The room is designed for maximum comfort and privacy.
rooms.vastu_notes: The master suite should be located in the north-west direction to support restful sleep and well-being.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom with sufficient space for storage and art deco accents, designed as a secondary living space.
rooms.vastu_notes: Located in the north-east to encourage balance and positivity.

rooms.name: Family Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious room intended for family use. The layout incorporates art deco detailing with functional storage solutions.
rooms.vastu_notes: This room is positioned in the east to promote harmony and communication within the household.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A modest guest bathroom equipped with basic amenities, styled with art deco fixtures.
rooms.vastu_notes: The guest bathroom is ideally situated away from main living areas to maintain privacy.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: A small balcony overlooking the garden with art deco railings, offering a private outdoor space.

openings.name: Window Panels
openings.description: Multiple windows designed in geometric patterns to enhance natural lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom (Studio)
rooms.description: A versatile studio space that can serve as a home office, creative workspace, or additional bedroom. The design remains consistent with art deco aesthetics.
rooms.vastu_notes: Placing the studio in the west promotes creativity and innovation.

rooms.name: Storage and Utility Room
rooms.description: A functional storage room that also houses essential utilities, designed with simple finishes to maintain the art deco theme.
rooms.vastu_notes: Positioned in the south-west for ease of maintenance without disrupting energy flow.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A dedicated service entrance that connects to the utility area, ensuring privacy and functionality.

openings.name: Balcony Overlook
openings.description: An outdoor balcony space providing access to a garden view with art deco inspired detailing.
